title: Selma Blair looks in good spirits as she treats herself to ice cream during girls' outing in LA
text:
Selma Blair looked in good spirits as she stepped out in Studio City, California on Wednesday to run some errands.

The 47-year-old actress, who underwent chemotherapy this summer as part of her treatment for multiple-sclerosis, was joined by a friend for the outing.

The Cruel Intentions star kept things casual for the outing as she donned a casual grey T-shirt, teamed with a matching pair of Rocky Mountain cropped sweatpants.

Getting it done: Selma Blair looked in good spirits as she stepped out in Studio City, California on Wednesday to run some errands and grab ice cream

She accessorised with large sunglasses and white sneakers with green trim as she unloaded a stroller from her ride and loaded it up with grocery bags in a parking lot.

Later, Selma enjoyed some ice cream from Salt & Straw with a friend.

Blair has been dealing with the fallout of being diagnosed with MS, a degenerative disease affecting the central nervous system, since August of last year.

She has regularly posted her progress and experience on her Instagram account, and has included her journey as a mother to her eight-year-old son, Arthur Saint.

Yum: The 47-year-old actress also grabbed some ice cream with a gal pal

Also on Wednesday, the Legally Blonde performer posted a new image to her feed, depicting herself seated at a stationary 'faux paddle boat' at the Tapia Brothers Farm Pumpkin Patch in Encino with Arthur.

'Not exactly the river Thames in October,' Blair captioned the image, which shows Arthur with a newly shorter haircut seated at the paddles.

'Alas, the San Fernando valley is where it is at for faux paddle boating in a parking lot #pumpkinpatch #tapiabros #tradition. Happy Halloween month.'

Also on Wednesday: Selma posted a new image to her feed, depicting herself seated at a stationary 'faux paddle boat' at the Tapia Brothers Farm Pumpkin Patch in Encino with her son

While she continues to focus on her health, the Hellboy actress nonetheless does have two projects coming out soon.

One is the sequel After We Collided, which follows After, in which Blair will reprise her role of Carol Young. The film is due out next year.

The other is a horror movie called A Dark Foe, in which she plays psychiatrist Dr. Doris Baxter.
description: Selma Blair looked in good spirits as she stepped out in Studio City, California on Wednesday to run some errands and grab ice cream.
